roleset.name: strangeness

role.descr: domain in which arg1 is odd

example.name: eccentricity-n
example.text: The Pygmalion and Galatea (Florence, Palazzo Vecchio, c. 1529-30; largerly executed by the young Bronzino) and the contemporary Martyrdom of the Theban Legion (Florence, Pitti) revive some part of Jacopo's earlier emotional eccentricities, and even more conspicuously his eccentricities in drawing of anatomy.

example.name: eccentric-j
example.text: I do not say whether he was eccentric in the performance of his military duties.
example.arg: in the performance of his military duties.

roleset.note: ECCENTRICITY-N, ECCENTRIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes.

roleset.name: off center, or having a central axis not in the center

example.name: eccentricity-n
example.text: the holder being so mounted that the eccentricity of the wheel will move the holder to and fro with each rotation of the wheel.

example.name: eccentric-j
example.text: the ulnotriquetral ligament has another origin on the palmar aspect of the ulnar styloid, which is eccentric from the center of forearm rotation (fovea)
example.arg: from the center of forearm rotation (fovea)

roleset.note: ECCENTRICITY-N, ECCENTRIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes.
